title: The refutation of ane ansuer made be Schir Iohne Knox to ane letter send be Iames Tyrie, to his vmquhyle brother. Sett furth be Iames Tyrie.
author: Tyrie, James, 1543-1597.
publisher: Apud Thomam brumenium in clauses brunello sub signo Oliu√¶,
notes: At foot of title page: Cum privilegio.
Includes Tyrie's original letter, Knox's answer reprinted from STC 15062, An answer to a letter of a Iesuit named Tyrie (1572), and Tyrie's refutation.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
